name: NOCO
description: We make renewable energy projects easier to find. Our aim is to create value for our customers by streamlining and de-risking the early stages of low carbon project development using big data.

jobs.title: Business Development Associate
jobs.description:
NOCO uses big data and machine learning to accelerate the early stages of renewable energy project development. We are looking for a BDM with experience in developing commercial and industrial energy projects that can help us drive innovation in the space using technology. Our primary focus is on-site solar & storage for large commercial buildings. Additional areas of focus are EV infrastructure and energy efficiency.

The ideal candidate will lead initiatives to generate and engage with business partners to build new business for the company. This candidate will be focused and have strong communication skills. They should be able to think critically when making plans and have a demonstrated ability to execute a particular strategy, while also being able to identify opportunities for innovation and putting them in practice.
 
Responsibilities
Identify and cultivate new project development opportunities
Develop new relationships in an effort to grow business and help the company expand
Maintain existing business
Think critically when planning to assure project success
Take projects from initial contact through to handover

Qualifications
Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience
3 - 4 years' prior industry-related business development experience
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Proven knowledge and execution of successful development strategies
Focused and goal-oriented

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description:
NOCO uses big data and machine learning to accelerate the early stages of renewable energy project development. We are looking for a data scientist to join our team. 
 
Responsibilities:
Experimenting with data frameworks, processes and structures
Creating cloud-based scalable systems to support our long term goals
Collecting, cleaning and processing data
Research and develop statistical learning models
Refine and improve existing models

Requirements
The candidate must have a good understanding of renewable energy technologies, energy transmission/distribution networks and of energy systems modelling. 



Qualifications
Masters degree or equivalent experience in Physics or Engineering
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Focused and goal-oriented
